sub_title: Managing Director/Owner Prana Consult - Parking beyond Borders/Co-founder/Partner at MPC-FlexParking B.V.
summary:
Balanced on-and off-street financial viable parking solutions, feasibility studies on off-street parking, marketing analysis, traffic impact studies, investor and operational analysis, investor search, sustainability , strategic conceptor for urban development related to parking solutions, infrastructure optimazation and added value for dedicated and sustainable quality in urban space and real estate developments, car park architecture, technical design and dedicated parking policy

Specialties: strategic concepts for urban development & parking solutions, tailor-made car park concepts and feasibility, full-service car park design-, pre-engineering-, building-, investment and operational consultancy, project- and process management on-and off-street parking,  traffic impact studies, road design, buy and sell advisory for investors on off-street car parks, world-wide international parking experience over decades of years.

school.name: University at Delft, post-MSc. courses on Transportation Engineering, Civil Works and Parking Policy

education.field_of_study: Transportation Engineering, Road Building, Hydraulic Engineering & Road safety

projects.title: Prana Consult, sustainable parking & traffic consultancy beyond borders
projects.description: International Parking Consultancy Services: Flora Fountain Square, Crawford Market, Regal Cinema Square underground car parks in Mumbai (India), multi storey car park Sukarno Hatta Airport Terminal ll Jakarta (Indonesia), multi storey car park Manama Airport (Bahrain), multi storey car park Philipsburg (Saint Martin Dutch Caribbean Windward Island),  multi storey car park Torarica Hotel, Paramaribo (Surinam), Rabat (Palais Tazi/ former Palais King Mohamed V, underground car parks Parliament  & 7* Hotel/Conference Centre (Morocco), multi storey car park Bennani/place Koutoubia Marrakech (Morocco), underground car park Ortakoy 7*hotel & wellness resort/conference center Istanbul (Turkey), and many others

contributors.headline: Managing Director/Owner Prana Consult - Parking beyond Borders/Co-founder/Partner at MPC-FlexParking B.V.

profile_positions.description: MPCFlexParking (www.mpcflexparking.com ) is a world-wide full-service (design, build, own,maintain, finance) provider of light-weight (aluminium coated) (semi-)permanent parking structures. The modular structure components are 100% sustainable (no material loss on relocation, no heavy cranes during construction, easy foundation, no environmental impact during construction, construction in short time, also for extension of existing car parks or roof parking on existing buildings or temporary car park on pontoons, solar panels for lighting). MPCFlexParking offers a tailor made solution establishing optimized operation cost by balancing parking revenues and investment cost at any time and at any place as a flexible circular economy based 'green' parking solution, also proving its added value in combination with in-site commercial & shopping areas, top-roof leisure provisions or mid-layer storage boxes. Due to the over years  increasing exit-value of the aluminium component's basic material for investors a guarantee on  investment cost is for sure.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder/Partner

profile_positions.description: Prana Consult (www.pranaconsult.com ) is a full service and world-wide operating parking consultancy having experience for decades of years in the expertisefields of parking strategy & urban development, parking policy, car park concept & design, car park planning & feasibility studies, car park construction, car park operation & investment, car park contracting & construction project management based on international recognized expertise and a wide ranging parking expert network. Off-street parking projects range from The Netherlands all over Europe, as well as world-wide: s.a. Bahrain (Manama City/Manama Airport) , Dubai City, Turkey (Istanbul/Ortakoy) India (Mumbai, New Delhi), Indonesia (Jakarta, Bali), Morocco (Rabat, Tanger, Cassablanca, Marrakech, Surinam(Paramaribo) Curacao (Willemstad), Saint Martin Windward Island (St. Philipsburg).
profile_positions.title: Owner/Managing Director/Senior-consultant

profile_positions.description: Strategic consulting, including business and sales strategy on urban developmet projects related to sustainable, dedicated, solid and financialoperational feasible parking solutions. Generating new development deals on real estate projects with related parking solutions. Multi-disciplinary focus on transportation and environmental issues related to urban area development projects.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Director Environment & Transportation (Urban Development)

profile_positions.description: entrepreneurial teammanagement, business responsibility management, process & project management on real estate development and turn key delivery of financial viable car parks based on total-engineering and a dedicated parking policy
profile_positions.title: Managing Director
